grunt.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: to make short sounds or say a few words in a rough voice, when you do not want to talk
grunt.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: He just grunted and carried on reading his book.
grunt.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: if a person or animal grunts, they make short low sounds in their throat
grunt.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: Grunting with effort, she lifted me up.
grunt.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: a short low sound that a person or animal makes in their throat
grunt.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: Chris gave a grunt and went back to sleep.
grunt.translation[1].definitions[1].defi: someone who does hard physical work for low pay
